{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC2890W-AN |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/20/2013 |manuf_country= |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=OAP9112A-17 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=YZKSMC2891WAN |ic_id= |pwr_v=48 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=Ethernet (PoE) |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,N-Female |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,N-Female |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=outdoor,enterprise class |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.10 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} ''802.11a/b/g/n Outdoor Dual Band Wireless Access Point''
[http://www.smc-asia.com/microsite/2013_ec_ctc/image/SMC2890-91W-AN_DS_Draft0.5_20120926_TW.pdf Datasheet] The device likely uses AR934x + (AR9280 / AR9382 / AR9582). "P/N: 142000000596A REV: 01" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"P/N: 142000000597A REV: 01" is silkscreened on the wireless module. Additional models covered by this FCC ID in the FCC test report follow... *'''Accton''' OAP9112A-17 *'''Edge-corE''' ECWO5110 and ECWO5110-L *'''SMC''' SMC2980W-AN, SMC2891W-AN, SMC2890W-AN-L, SMC2891W-AN-L The SMC2891W-AN [http://www.smc-asia.com/microsite/2013_ec_ctc/image/SMC2890-91W-AN_DS_Draft0.5_20120926_TW.pdf appears to have an integrated 5GHz directional antenna]. Default credentials are per the FCC manual. :The manual also specifies the default SSIDs as '''EAP9112A_11BGN_0''' (through '''_15''' for VAPs 0-15) and '''EAP9112A_11NA_0''' (through '''_15''' for VAPs 0-15). Possible B8:9B:C9 ('''SMC Networks''') OUI (on FCC EUT MAC label)
